name: @grist/stlor-interactives-scripts
description: Scripts for generating, storing, and deploying the data and code used by interactives in STLoR.

scripts.build: pnpm run process:parcels && pnpm run process:reservations && pnpm run gen:patterns && pnpm run gen:pmtiles
scripts.gen:patterns: tsc && node dist/generate-patterns.js && cp data/processed/land-use-patterns.json ../stlor-map/static/land-use-patterns.json && cp data/processed/rights-type-pattern.json ../stlor-map/static/rights-type-pattern.json

author: Parker Ziegler <peziegler@cs.berkeley.edu>
